languages.text: "Проклятье Трона... Справедливо, Лорд-капитан. Я бы и сам с собой поступил так же". {n}Мужчина тяжело опускается на колени. Вид у него торжественный и мрачный. Вы слышите устрашенные шепоты.{/n}
"Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Проклятье Трона... Справедливо, Лорд-капитан. Я бы и сам с собой поступил так же". {n}Мужчина тяжело опускается на колени. Вид у него торжественный и мрачный. Вы слышите устрашенные шепоты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}The man sinks heavily to his knees. He looks solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}

languages.text: «Que el Trono los maldiga... Es lo justo, Lord Capitán. Es lo que habría hecho yo en su lugar». {n}Se deja caer de rodillas con pesadez, con aspecto solemne y resignado. Oyes susurros aterrados.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Que el Trono los maldiga... Es lo justo, Lord Capitán. Es lo que habría hecho yo en su lugar». {n}Se deja caer de rodillas con pesadez, con aspecto solemne y resignado. Oyes susurros aterrados.{/n}

languages.text: 「王座がなんだ…いいでしょう、ロード・キャプテン。俺自身がしてきたことだ」{n}彼は重々しく膝をつき、厳粛勝つ陰鬱な表情をしている。怯えたような囁きが聞こえてくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「王座がなんだ…いいでしょう、ロード・キャプテン。俺自身がしてきたことだ」{n}彼は重々しく膝をつき、厳粛勝つ陰鬱な表情をしている。怯えたような囁きが聞こえてくる。{/n}

languages.text: “黄金王座诅咒他们……您说的有道理，舰长大人。要是换做是我，我也会这么对待我自己。”{n}他沉重地跪在地上，神情庄严而忧郁。你听到了他口中恐惧的低语。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “黄金王座诅咒他们……您说的有道理，舰长大人。要是换做是我，我也会这么对待我自己。”{n}他沉重地跪在地上，神情庄严而忧郁。你听到了他口中恐惧的低语。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Thron sei verflucht ... Also schön, Lord Captain. Ich hätte mit mir dasselbe gemacht." {n}Er sinkt schwer auf die Knie und wirkt ernst und betrübt. Du hörst verängstigtes Flüstern.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Thron sei verflucht ... Also schön, Lord Captain. Ich hätte mit mir dasselbe gemacht." {n}Er sinkt schwer auf die Knie und wirkt ernst und betrübt. Du hörst verängstigtes Flüstern.{/n}

languages.text: « Bon sang... C'est de bonne guerre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'en aurais fait de même. » {n}Il tombe lourdement à genoux, l'air sombre et solennel. Vous entendez des murmures terrifiés.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Bon sang... C'est de bonne guerre, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'en aurais fait de même. » {n}Il tombe lourdement à genoux, l'air sombre et solennel. Vous entendez des murmures terrifiés.{/n}

languages.text: "Taht bildiği gibi yapsın... Öyle olsun Lord Kaptan. Bu işi başıma kendim açtım." {n}Ağır bir şekilde dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor. Vakur ve hüzünlü görünüyor. Kulağına dehşet içinde fısıltılar geliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Throne blast it... Fair enough, Lord Captain. It's what I'd have done to myself." {n}He sinks heavily to his knees, looking solemn and gloomy. You hear terrified whispers.{/n}
